quote: Instead getting notifications to update software, you receive notifications to suspend an update.
To unsubscribe from a newsletter there is no unsubscribe link. You need to create an e-mail filter rule.
To use a simple HR app, you need to start a virtual machine and boot into Windows.
A simple HR app crashes the only supported browser, the Internet Explorer every time when doing a common operation.
You are allowed to but cannot use Skype for technical reasons.
It takes days to resolve technical Skype issues.
You need to indicate your vacation in four different places.
You receive 100 e-mails per day and 99 of them have absolutely no relevance for you.
